Package view.dialogs

Class ThemeRadioButton

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.control.MenuItem
javafx.scene.control.RadioMenuItem
view.components.items.ThemeRadioButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Toggle
public class ThemeRadioButton
extends javafx.scene.control.RadioMenuItem
A ThemeRadioButton is a button, able to change the theme of the app Tips : : For create new themes, you have to : - Choose the color, we will called it : nameOfTheColor - Create the css you want (Named `javafxTestCSS + nameOfTheColor` ex: javafxTestCSSBlack) - Create the ThemeRadioButton Object, don't miss to put the group in the constructor => Group is a toggleGroup - Add the ThemeRadioButton in the menu you wan't - Don't miss to put the setOnAction on object you've just instantiated (ex : blackRadioButton.setOnAction(this::onRadioClicked)
Version:
%I%, %G%
Author:
NÃ©o ALMEIDA
